alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Lakeshore; Lake; Medina; Portage; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 3:34AM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch except in eastern Ashtabula County where 1 to 3 inches are possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Ohio. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A heavy band of snow in Ashtabula County at 3 AM will gradually shift east into Pennsylvania early this morning. Otherwise snow will begin to taper off from west to east early this morning. Temperatures will continue to to fall into the 20s with wind chills in the teens.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Lakeshore; Lake; Medina; Portage; Summit; Trumbull
